quote: China has a business tax rate of 15%. We should do everything possible to match them in order to win with our economy. Jobs and wages!
quotePlain: China has a business tax rate of 15%. We should do everything possible to match them in order to win with our economy. Jobs and wages!
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: But China has a standard corporate tax income rate of 25 per cent, according to the State Administration of Taxation.
checks.quotePlain: But China has a standard corporate tax income rate of 25 per cent, according to the State Administration of Taxation.

claims.truth: It has been 25% since 2008. Before then it was 33%.
